Sentence.value: Agglutinins are antibodies that cause the red blood cells to clump together.
Sentence.pattern_crowdsource: [[Agglutinins|C0001804]] are [[antibodies|C0003241]] that cause the red blood cells to clump together.

Sentence.value: This article describes the blood test that is used to measure the level of these antibodies in the blood.
Sentence.pattern_crowdsource: This article describes the blood test that is used to measure the level of these [[antibodies|C0003241]] in the [[blood|C0005767]].
